lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Brazil, which declared an interest payments moratorium last month, is leading a challenge to Washington's strategy and officials here obviously feared any decisions that might deepen rifts between the United States and Third World nations.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But monetary sources expect Baker to suggest the United States has some room for compromise and also to fend off other challenges to its strategy by signalling Washington is open to innovative solutions to the debt problem.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Currently, a simple majority can approve or disapprove loans giving the borrowing nations control of the purse strings and resulting in loan conditions too lax for Washington's taste.
